SELECT A.BOARD_ID , SUBSTRING(A.BOARD_ID, CHAR_LENGTH('BOARD_') + 1) AS BOARD_ID_NUM , A.CATEGORY , A.BOARD_SJ
, A.INQIRE_CO , A.RECOMMEND_CNT , A.CREAT_IP , A.IS_NOTICE , A.OTHBC_AT , A.USE_AT , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.REGISTER_ID , B.NICKNAME , COUNT(C.REPLY_ID) AS REPLY_CNT , COUNT(D.ATCH_FILE_ID) AS CHK_IMAGE , D.STRE_FILE_NM , D.FILE_EXTSN FROM BOARD A JOIN USERINFO B ON A.REGISTER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN REPLY C ON A.BOARD_ID = C.BOARD_ID AND C.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN FILE D ON A.ATCH_FILE_ID = D.ATCH_FILE_ID AND D.USE_AT = 'Y' AND D.FILE_SN = 0
GROUP BY A.BOARD_ID, A.CATEGORY, A.BOARD_SJ, A.INQIRE_CO, A.RECOMMEND_CNT, A.CREAT_IP, A.IS_NOTICE, A.OTHBC_AT, A.USE_AT, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.REGISTER_ID, B.NICKNAME , D.STRE_FILE_NM ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BOARD A JOIN USERINFO B ON A.REGISTER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT BOARD_ID , CATEGORY , BOARD_SJ , BOARD_CN , INQIRE_CO , CREAT_IP , OTHBC_AT , USE_AT , ATCH_FILE_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , RECOMMEND_CNT , IS_NOTICE , NICKNAME FROM BOARD JOIN USERINFO ON REGISTER_ID = USER_ID WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND USE_AT = 'Y'
SELECT RECOMMEND_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
